name: Jaipo - JAIku POster
short_description:
Jaipo - JAIku commandline POster, is a Jaiku microblog client software. 
We can use the jaipo client to post without loading the whole fat page. 
It's writen in perl, so it can run on any platform with perl. 
Even on embedded system.
